__e: You get a heart, she won't.
Or you get an e-mail from your daughter, halfway around the world, and... you think, "When did my baby grow up?"
So, why don't you walk us through the process of what happens when you receive a body?
You don't get to tell me that we're not together.
I don't know who you are, but if you don't get off my property right now,
And you don't get to say what he can and can't do with it.
